column6: TRUE BELIEVERS PART 3 It's the first public appearance of Excelsior, as characters again don their classic costumes. But do these young heroes intend to help the Runaways, or destroy them?
column8: | penciller:Adrian Alphona | penciller (cover):Jo Chen | letterer:Randy Gentile | colorist:Christina Strain | writer:Brian K. Vaughan | inker:Craig Yeung
